title: Cannot approve prototype when prototype_approved is already true
description:
When running the flow until tests (all tests pass) and then trying to approve the prototype, the command fails with: error: Cannot approve prototype: phases.prototype.prototype_approved is already true.

The phase state already has prototype_approved set to true, so the explicit approve action is rejected.

Reproduction steps:
1. Run flow till tests.
2. Ensure all tests pass.
3. Try to approve the prototype.

Result: Error. Expected: Either the prototype can be approved without error when already approved, or the state should not be set to approved until the user explicitly approves.
